text: saM~Mya#tta indriqyENaq vai maqnyunAq mana#sA saMgrAqmaM ja#yaqtIndra#mEqva ma#nyuqmantaqM mana#svantaq(gg)q svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvAsmi#nnindriqyaM maqnyuM manO# dadhAtiq jaya#tiq ta(gm) sa#grAMqmamindrA#ya maqrutva#tE pRuSnisaqkthamA la#BEtaq grAma#kAmaq indra#mEqva maqrutva#ntaq(gg)q svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvAsmai# sa jAqtAn praya#cCati grAqmyE#va Ba#vatiq yadRu#ShaqBastEnaiq - [  ]  17
